de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class CircleTransitionAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DrawableAnimation
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.BackgroundAnimation
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.CircleTransitionAnimation

  • public class CircleTransitionAnimation
extends BackgroundAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder
      A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.BackgroundAnimation

        BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends BackgroundAnimation,BuilderType extends BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DrawableAnimation

        DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends DrawableAnimation,BuilderType extends DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>, DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CircleTransitionAnimation(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new animation, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircleTransitionAnimation

        protected CircleTransitionAnimation(@NonNull
                                    android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new animation, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the animation, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • setX

        protected final void setX(int x)
        Sets the horizontal position, which should be used by the animation.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal position, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The horizontal position must be at least 0

      • setY

        protected final void setY(int y)
        Sets the vertical position, which should be used by the animation.
        Parameters:
        y - The vertical position, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The vertical position must be at least 0

      • setRadius

        protected final void setRadius(int radius)
        Sets the radius, which should be used by the animation.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The radius must be at least 0

      • getX

        public final java.lang.Integer getX()
        Returns the horizontal position, which is used by the animation.
        Returns:
        The horizontal position, which is used by the animation, in pixels as an Integer value or null, if the animation should start at the center

      • getY

        public final java.lang.Integer getY()
        Returns the vertical position, which is used by the animation.
        Returns:
        The vertical position, which is used by the animation, in pixels as an Integer value or null, if the animation should start at the center

      • getRadius

        public final int getRadius()
        Returns the radius, which is used by the animation.
        Returns:
        The radius, which is used by the animation, in pixels as an Integer value
